data.title: Al Murray: The Only Way Is Epic
meta_keywords: Al Murray: The Only Way Is Epic guide cast details episodes information Stand-Up Comedy Central 2013 Al Murray: The Pub Landlord - The Only Way Is Epic; Al Murray: The Pub Landlord - The Only Way Is Epic Tour; Al Murray: The Pub Landlord - The Only Way Is Epic Live Al Murray
data.meta_description: A guide to Al Murray: The Only Way Is Epic, the 2013 Comedy Central TV stand-up. The Pub Landlord returns to the theatres of Britain with his own plan to rescue the economy and the future of the country.
data.text:
Good things come in threes - the Jubilee, the Olympics and now the Pub Landlord's brand new tour: The Only Way Is Epic. This year the Guv is all about legacy - he wants a tour to show that yes, we can all make a difference, go the distance.

Tackling the Euro, Why Kids Don't Know The Meaning Of Hard Work, Saying The Unsayable, Scots' Independence and the Delicate Balance of Supply and Demand, the Guv's tour will reboot you as parents, sort you out as kids, set you free as citizens.

Ambitious? Yes. Epic? Certainly. This is the TV edit of a live DVD, recorded during his 2012 The Only Way Is Epic Tour.
